接口 Fraction

所有超级接口:
Comparable<Fraction>
所有已知实现类:
FractionImpl
public interface Fraction extends Comparable<Fraction>
The Fraction interface represents a mathematical fraction with an integer numerator and a positive integer denominator. Implementations must ensure: - The denominator is always positive - Any negativity is stored in the numerator Implementing classes must provide: - A constructor Fraction(int numerator, int denominator) that throws IllegalArgumentException if denominator 无效输入：'<'= 0

  • 方法详细资料

    • getNumerator

      int getNumerator()
      Returns the numerator of this fraction.
      返回:
      the numerator

    • setNumerator

      void setNumerator(int numerator)
      Sets the numerator of this fraction.
      参数:
      numerator - the new numerator

    • getDenominator

      int getDenominator()
      Returns the denominator of this fraction.
      返回:
      the denominator (always positive)

    • setDenominator

      void setDenominator(int denominator)
      Sets the denominator of this fraction.
      参数:
      denominator - the new denominator (must be positive)
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if denominator 无效输入：'<'= 0

    • toDouble

      double toDouble()
      Returns the decimal (scientific) value of this fraction.
      返回:
      the value of this fraction as a double

    • toString

      String toString()
      Returns a String representation of this fraction in simplest form. Examples: - "4 / 2" becomes "2 / 1" - "-6 / 8" becomes "-3 / 4"
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Object
      返回:
      the simplified fractional representation

    • reciprocal

      Fraction reciprocal()
      Returns the reciprocal of this fraction.
      返回:
      a new Fraction that is the reciprocal
      抛出:
      ArithmeticException - if the numerator is 0

    • add

      Fraction add(Fraction other)
      Adds this fraction to another fraction.
      参数:
      other - the fraction to add
      返回:
      a new Fraction representing the sum
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if other is null

    • compareTo

      int compareTo(Fraction other)
      Compares this fraction with another fraction.
      指定者:
      compareTo 在接口中 Comparable<Fraction>
      参数:
      other - the fraction to compare to
      返回:
      a negative integer if this 无效输入：'<' other, a positive integer if this > other, or 0 if equal
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if other is null
